key_points: Over 2.8 million people have signed a Change.org petition for $2,000 monthly stimulus payments to Americans.
The petition aims for 3 million signatures to become one of the top signed on Change.org.
Petition creator, Stephanie Bonin, emphasized the need for immediate and recurring payments during the pandemic.
Five additional Change.org petitions for monthly stimulus checks are gaining attention.
Current economic improvement makes a fourth stimulus check from the White House or Congress unlikely at this time.
There has been no direct legislation passed for a fourth stimulus check by the Biden administration or Congress.
Rumors of a $7,000 fourth stimulus check being distributed this week are false.
The U.S. government has issued three rounds of stimulus payments since the start of the pandemic, with varying amounts.
The first stimulus payment was up to $1,200 in March 2020.
Subsequent payments were $600 in December 2020 and up to $1,400 in March 2021.
